# Welcome to openwashdata

## openwashdata is an active global community that applies FAIR principles to data generated in the greater water, sanitation, and hygiene (WASH) sector

- Receive credit for work that is not a scientific paper
- Give recognition to those that support your work
- Tell stories with data that haven't yet been told 
- Meet people that care about data and code being open and reusable

***
Our mission is to empower WASH professionals to engage with tools and workflows for open data and code.
